organizations: National Museum of Racing Hall of Fame Stakes
lead_paragraph: Nobiz Like Shobiz won his turf debut by half a length over Marcavelly in the $150,000 National Museum of Racing Hall of Fame Stakes at Saratoga Race Course in New York. Running just behind Sahara Heat’s pace for most of the one-and-an-eighth-mile race, jockey Cornelio Velazquez launched a bid at the head of the stretch to take the Grade II race for 3-year-olds. Nobiz Like Shobiz was coming off a second-place effort in the Dwyer on July 4 at Belmont Park.
